references.paper_title: Global Precipitation Climatology Project (GPCP) Climate Data Record (CDR), Version 1.3 (Daily)
references.reason: This paper provides the Global Precipitation Climatology Project (GPCP) Daily Precipitation Analysis Climate Data Record, which serves as an important reference dataset for validating the climate models' precipitation outputs.
This paper introduces ERA5, a widely used reanalysis dataset that serves as a crucial reference for validating climate model outputs in terms of surface temperature and other variables.

references.paper_title: Overview of the Coupled Model Intercomparison Project Phase 6 (CMIP6) experimental design and organization
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of the Coupled Model Intercomparison Project Phase 6 (CMIP6), which is the main source of climate model data used in the study for comparison and analysis.

references.paper_title: Sliced and radon wasserstein barycenters of measures
references.reason: This is a foundational paper for the sliced Wasserstein distance, which is extended in this study to create a new spherical convolutional Wasserstein distance for climate model validation.
This paper introduces the generalized sliced Wasserstein distance, which is extended in this study to create a new spherical convolutional Wasserstein distance for climate model validation.
